entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 07:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -10.2°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 20 except minus 25 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 20 except minus 25 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
